group_1.narration: Ultimately, I couldn't fully recover in@time. I heard of the conclusion of@the unrest at the Coordinator's.

group_1.textRight: By the time we got there, it was all over.
For her to die... It's just...

group_1.narration: With this event, the Magical Girls involved@should have learned how closely death@lurks to each and every one of them.
Even the victims and their friends who were@not directly involved in the events of that @day should've come to know the truth of the@cruel fate that had been thrust upon them.
However... Nanaka told another story.
Other than to a certain few, she said the@cause of Hanna's death was that she was@deranged and "suggested" to herself that@she take her own life. In other words...
The truth that Magical Girls meet@their deaths when their Soul Gems@are broken was hidden.
Yes... Our true fate is even crueler...

group_1.textRight: I never should've let Hazuki and Ayame make@contracts!

group_1.narration: Nanaka judged that some would not be able@to bear the weight of this truth and made it@a secret to the three who were there.
It seems that Nanaka actually@already knew the general truth about@Soul Gems and kept it secret.
She said it needed to be the right time...@But I think she felt she couldn't say it.
I'm sure she feared the cruel truth, too.@Anyone who found out would feel the same...
Nanaka secretly moved Hanna's body@to a place it would be easily found@and reported it to the police.
The suggestion magic had been undone@following her death. This brought her@artfully hidden tracks to light.
Her father led a shameful life, their home@broken, until both he and her mother died.
Hanna, who was placed in a home,@was said to have been closed off@until she disappeared one day.
That is likely when she@became a Magical Girl.
The police reported the cause of death as@uncertain. Their investigation into foul play@came up short ultimately, so they declared@it a so-called "unsolved" mysterious death.
It wasn't long until everyone began to@return to their normal lives...

group_1.textLeft: I said it's okay! It wasn't your fault...

group_1.textRight: No, really... I kind of...flew off the@handle there...

group_1.textLeft: But it has come to this... I will take full@responsibility, and—!

group_1.textRight: Aw, cut it out! I told you to stop that!

group_1.textLeft: Man, so many people have been apologizing@since yesterday.
But it's already over and done...
So forget it! Let's talk about what happens@now, huh?
This is a chance for me, like...
I wanna get to know more Magical Girls!
So...we could go to a cafe or something.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that'd be nice, I guess...

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh? Wait a sec...[chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:motion_300][chara:302701:lipSynch_1] Oh no, I really did@it...
Mind if I take some cash out before we go?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, our treat! It's the least we could do!

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki's goin' off somewhere with a big smile@on her face again...

group_1.textRight: She trickin' them into payin' for her meal?

group_1.textLeft: No fair! I want free stuff too!

group_1.textRight: Why didn't ya call me?! If you were in a@fight, I woulda been there for ya!

group_1.textLeft: Ah... I get what you wanna say, Kako.
If we called Felicia, all hell woulda broken@loose! Right?!

group_1.narration: As for myself...

group_1.textCenter: It really is a beautiful view.

group_1.textLeft: About Mikoto winning against the Witch, but@still losing?

group_1.textRight: Like, it must've been a draw or something...

group_1.textLeft: Mikoto defeated the Witch but it dealt her a@mortal blow, you mean?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we don't have anything to back that up@though.
It's just the only thing we could think of...

group_1.textLeft: That conclusion is valid given what you@currently know.
Concerning Mikoto and Hanna... Allow me@to take over.
I'll let you know if I find anything out.

group_1.textRight: Nice to meet you. I'm Konoha Shizumi.

group_1.textLeft: Konoha Shizumi... I am Kanagi Izumi.
It appears Konoha heard about this meeting@and decided to come as well.

group_1.textRight: I've been walking around where Hanna appeared@that day, thinking...
About, hm...her thoughts, or her feelings...
I don't know... Anyway, I was thinking@aimlessly really...
She twisted up and wreaked havoc on the lives@of so many people.
But because she stirred up a giant vortex@that sucked everything in...

group_1.textLeft: Nanaka, have you been thinking about these @matters like Konoha has?

group_1.textRight: But... I get the feeling it would be a @bad thing...
...to understand what was going through her@head...

group_1.textCenter: I'm on the opposite side as you...

group_1.textRight: If I really understood it...I might cross a@line I shouldn't cross, like her.

group_1.textLeft: I-I can't imagine you would ever...

group_1.textCenter: I get the feelin' plenty's gonna start real@soon.

group_1.textLeft: Something is on the verge of beginning...?

group_1.narration: After this, the Magical Girls of Kamihama@would experience an unprecedented@and merciless battle against...
...the [textRed:Wings of the Magius].
